title: Qualitative Research Interview Design Masterclass

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Structured as smartphone-based microlearning modules, providing 15-minute learning content 3–4 times per week.

learning_goals: Establish a three-tiered (broad/intermediate/focused) mapping strategy for interview topics through literature review
Apply question design principles and bias mitigation techniques based on educational psychology to create interview protocols
Use AI tools to evaluate the validity of interview questions and conduct multi-stage pilot testing

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
